body_html:
I think it's a bug in your code rather than in TensorFlow.
(when you call AdamOptimizer the second time, it creates an op which optimizes variables of both classifiers, so both sets of placeholders need to be fed)

body:
I think it's a bug in your code rather than in TensorFlow. 
(when you call `AdamOptimizer` the second time, it creates an op which optimizes variables of both classifiers, so both sets of placeholders need to be fed)
